Cambodia's Genocide

Never Again

Begin here

Quotes

Why we’re doing the website

“You have to understand what caused genocide to happen. Or it will happen again” - Tim Walz

Why genocide is definitively evil

“Genocide is an attempt to exterminate people, not to change behavior” - Jack Schwartz

Why stopping genocide is a generational & global responsibility

“You will be judged in the years to come by how you responded to the genocide on your watch” - Nick Kristof

Why you can survive a genocide but cannot outlast it

“My grandparents, like many genocide survivors, took their stories to their graves” - Chris Bojalian

HIST 2791 International Humanitarianism

This website is for our team's final project, to document the genocide in Cambodia from 1975 to 1979 and its effects.
